verses.verse: And it came to pass, when <S%H2985>Jabin<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> those things, that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4068>Madon<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>, and to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H407>Achshaph<s%>,

And to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> that were on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and of the <S%H6160>plains<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>valley<s%>, and in the <S%H5299>borders<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>,

And to the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%> and on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and to the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and to the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> under <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>.

And they went <S%H3318>out<s%>, they and all their <S%H4264>hosts<s%> with them, <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, even as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is upon the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude<s%>, with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%>.

And when all these <S%H4428>kings<s%> were met <S%H3259>together<s%>, they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom<s%>, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of them: for to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> will I deliver them <S%H5414>up<s%> all <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: thou shalt <S%H6131>hough<s%> their <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with him, against them by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4792>Merom<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>; and they fell <S%H5307>upon<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> them unto <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and unto <S%H4956>Misrephoth-maim<s%>, and unto the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, until they <S%H7604>left<s%> them none <S%H8300>remaining<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto them as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%> him: he <S%H6131>houghed<s%> their <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> their <S%H4818>chariots<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> turned <S%H7725>back<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>: for <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was the <S%H7218>head<s%> of all those <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>.

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that were therein with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> them: there was not any <S%H3498>left<s%> to <S%H5397>breathe<s%>: and he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of those <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of them, did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3920>take<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and he utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

But as for the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> still in their <S%H8510>strength<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> none of them, <S%H2108>save<s%> <S%H2674>Hazor<s%> only; that did <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burn<s%>.

And all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of these <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> unto themselves; but every <S%H120>man<s%> they <S%H5221>smote<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, until they had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, neither <S%H7604>left<s%> they any to <S%H5397>breathe<s%>.

¶ As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and so <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>; he <S%H5493>left<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%> <S%H5493>undone<s%> of all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all that <S%H776>land<s%>, the <S%H2022>hills<s%>, and all the south <S%H5045>country<s%>, and all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>, and the <S%H8219>valley<s%>, and the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and the <S%H8219>valley<s%> of the same;

Even from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak<s%>, that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, even unto <S%H1171>Baal-gad<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> under <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>: and all their <S%H4428>kings<s%> he <S%H3920>took<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> them.
<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> with all those <S%H4428>kings<s%>.

There was not a <S%H5892>city<s%> that made <S%H7999>peace<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, save the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>: all other they <S%H3947>took<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>.

For it was of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2388>harden<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%>, that they should come <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that he might destroy them <S%H2763>utterly<s%>, and that they might have no <S%H8467>favour<s%>, but that he might <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, from <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, from <S%H1688>Debir<s%>, from <S%H6024>Anab<s%>, and from all the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and from all the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> destroyed them <S%H2763>utterly<s%> with their <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

There was none of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: only in <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, in <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, and in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, there <S%H7604>remained<s%>.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%>, according to all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8252>rested<s%> from <S%H4421>war<s%>.
